meta.job_title: SVP, Group Director, Digital Strategy & Analytics

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership for in-market lead generation digital communications strategy and creative brief development.
Lead comms and content planning capabilities, and grow and nurture the discipline within the agency.
Oversee client education program around comms planning design.
Write and present the touchpoint and content ecosystem plan and recommendation to the client in collaboration with other disciplines within the agency.
Define and share insights and findings regarding the target audiences and drive ongoing research and emerging research techniques.
Develop and manage content calendar, and oversee channel analytics teams to measure and report on performance.
Lead the strategy team in developing an integrated customer journey planning process.
Assist in the development of editorial governance so content is consistent with brand voice, style, and tone.
Support new business and agency growth as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field (Master's preferred)
